snippet: Known for a bold and cantankerous personality, Ms. Mulzac built Liberation Bookstore over four decades into a Harlem landmark.
abstract: Una Mulzac, founder of Harlem's Liberation Bookstore who dedicated her life to black politics, dies at age 88.
lead_paragraph: Known for a bold and cantankerous personality, Ms. Mulzac built Liberation Bookstore over four decades into a Harlem landmark.

headline.seo: Una Mulzac, Harlem Bookseller With a Passion for Black Politics, Dies at 88
headline.main: Una Mulzac, Bookseller With Passion for Black Politics, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Una Mulzac, 88, Bookseller With Passion for Black Politics
